data.eml:eml: A remarkable new species of Alloscorpiops Vachon, 1980 from a cave in Vietnam (Scorpiones, Euscorpiidae, Scorpiopinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lourenco, Wilson R., Pham, Dinh-Sac (2015): A remarkable new species of Alloscorpiops Vachon, 1980 from a cave in Vietnam (Scorpiones, Euscorpiidae, Scorpiopinae). ZooKeys 500: 73-82, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.500.9421, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.500.9421
